scripts.say: Look, I found something! Come here, Noire, there's some kind of hole over here!
It's just as Histoire said in her message. It appears to be a wormhole that's bending space itself... But why has it popped into existence here of all places?
Hey, do you think this could be, like, connected some other dimension or something?
Don't be ridiculous. You've just got manga and light novels on the brain.

You just don't get it, do you? Nothing fun's ever gonna happen if all we do is say that and move on! There's gotta be a wonderful new world waiting for us on the other end of this hole! Or, that's what it looks like.
There you go with your insane rambling again. Let's just check it out really quick and report back to Hist...
A CPU must be brave and bold! I'm going straight into that thing!Check out my super cool double cannonball!
What are you doing?! Stop!
Nep nep?!
Noiiiiiiiiire?!
SPLASSSSSHHHHH!
Blub blub blub... Gasp! W-Where the heck are we? Is this the ocean?! I mean, it doesn't look like a swimming pool!
Where the heck indeed. There's water in every direction. Don't tell me we actually ended up in another dimension...
*Gasp* Blub... I can't swim! I'm gonna drown! Help me, Noire!
Stop, let go of me! It's hard enough just to keep myself afloat! Wait... I've got an idea.
We can just turn into CPUs and fly to safety.
Whoa! You're so smart, Noire! Alright, I guess I'd better... transform!
Phew... This will have to do, for now.
Okay, back to the matter at hand. What is this place? I believe when we began examining that wormhole, it sucked us in here...
Incorrect. You said that it would be fun to jump into the wormhole. I tried to stop you but you just dragged me into it. We were hardly sucked into it.
Black Heart, I do believe it's time we leave the past behind us. I've already forgotten what happened.
Typical Purple Heart. Always getting amnesia when it's most convenient for you.
But seriously... where are we? This place reminds me of Gamindustri, but I know we've gone somewhere else entirely. Hm... I can barely feel the power of shares here...
Additionally, I can see wrecked ships littering the ocean. Are they... battleships?
There are collapsed buildings on the ocean floor and some strange debris floating around. Could this place have been a battlefield? One thing fought another, and then they...
Black Heart, look out!
KA-BAAAANG!
Phew, we really dodged a bullet there. Thank you, Purple Heart.
It's too early to thank me. Look over there.
What the?!
Is that... Are they... Us?
No, we're over here. They're obviously just doppelgangers.
First they impersonate us, then they attack us? Hah, I suppose imitation is the sincerest form of flattery... Let's give them a taste of their own medicine!
Hold up, Noire. I think it's best we retreat for the time being.
What the hell are you saying?! I'm not joking around here! They came straight out of nowhere and challenged us to a fight!
Calm down. We can't beat them, not like we are now.
That attack we dodged... It was as powerful as the combined power of both of us if we mustered every single bit of strength we have.
What's more... Remember what you said earlier? That you can barely feel any share influence in this world? ...As it is now, we don't stand a single chance against those two.
Our lack of shares is the problem...?! I hate to admit it, but I suppose you're right!
Now that you understand, we should retreat to fight another day.
I suppose we have no choice... Listen here, you fakes! Next time we meet, I won't be as nice to you!
...And that's the gist of it. We were in some serious trouble!
I see... Serious trouble, huh...

We couldn't muster any strength even after transforming into CPUs, then we went some random direction, then we wandered across the ocean, then we headed this direction... And finally, we made it here, somehow!
Then we spotted villager number one! The first person we found was you, Laffey!
Umm... Are you sure you don't mean that you were caught by me...?
I know how it feels to want to correct Neptune all the time.

Man, we were soooo exhausted going around the whole night! It was an all night wander-athon! Oh yeah, Laffey, where are we? What's this world like? Also, is this a school? Is it some kind of school where people with superpowers gather or something? Or is it an academy for pretty girls?
Uhh, well... This is an academy, we come here often...

Aha! I knew it was an academy! So like, you got a cafeteria with good food? Or an infirmary that doubles as a kitchen? Or a place that's like, "BAM, this is what we're known for!", you know? Like a drive-in movie theater where guys can take their gals out on a clichéd date...
Uhh... Um, I'm sorry...
Nep?! Sorry for what, Laffey?
Get a clue, Neptune... When you ask question after question at machine gun RPM, nobody's going to be able to answer you.
Yeah... I can only process data so fast, and I can't keep up.
Oh. Oops. Sorry... 'Kay, I'll speak more slowly then. What should I ask first...
Okay. But... I'm not very talkative... I don't know if I could help...
I see. Then is there anyone else around here who could answer our questions?
One of my friends could...
What's up, Laffey? ...Hm? Who are these people?
There seems to be a lot of commotion going on over here... Were you two just assigned here?
Yawn... You can take over from here...
Take over? What do you want me to take over?!
It's likely that she's referring to those people she was just talking to. Who are you two, and where did you come from...?
Oh right, we haven't introduced ourselves yet! The name's Neptune, and this lass here's my buddy...
WEEEEEH! WEEEEEH! WEEEEEH!
Nep?! Is that a siren I hear?! What's it for?
The emergency attack siren? There's... an enemy raid incoming?!
So this is where you all were... I was looking for you.
I have an emergency telegram from HQ. A Mirror Sea has appeared in the vicinity of the academy's shore... A fleet must be dispatched to scout the area immediately. They're counting on us, Z23.
Understood! I will attack at once!
Hold on a sec, Z23! I'll go with you!
If you're all going... Then I guess I'll go too...
...Welp, they all went to fight whatever, I guess.
A Mirror Sea... Those words caught my attention.
That might serve as a clue for figuring out what kind of world we've come to... We should hurry and catch up to those girls.
Sure. I'd be bored out of my mind just standing here and waiting for them anyway... Wait for us, guys!
...Just when I thought we'd caught up to them, they disappear... Sigh, can't I just catch a break for once?
I am fairly certain that as long as those two are involved, there will be breaks to catch for nobody.
